tasks.label: Scaffold AI Personal Team codebase
tasks.command: npx create-next-app@latest ai-personal-team --typescript --use-npm --no-tailwind --no-src-dir --app && cd ai-personal-team && npm install express && npm install axios && npm install dotenv && npm install react-query && npm install @types/express && npm install @types/node && npm install @types/react && npm install @types/react-dom
